# isHidden

**Instance Property**

A Boolean that determines the visibility of the group.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isHidden: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] to hide the group, or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] to display the group.

## Determining the group’s appearance

- **isDisplayingRepresentativeItem**: A Boolean value indicating whether the representative item is showing in place of the group’s items.
